mapper.insert: insert into hz_course (resource_id, logo_url, course_name, course_sn, course_type, score, course_intro, apply_user, train_target, sort, remark, create_time, creator_id, creator_name, last_update_time, updator_id, updator_name, is_delete ) values (#{resourceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{logoUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{courseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{courseSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{courseType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{score,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{courseIntro,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applyUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{trainTarget,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
mapper.update: update hz_course set logo_url = #{logoUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, course_name = #{courseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, course_sn = #{courseSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, course_type = #{courseType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, score = #{score,jdbcType=INTEGER}, course_intro = #{courseIntro,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, apply_user = #{applyUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, train_target = #{trainTarget,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, creator_id = #{creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creator_name = #{creatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_update_time = #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updator_id = #{updatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updator_name = #{updatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER} where resource_id = #{resourceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select resource_id, logo_url, course_name, course_sn, course_type, score, course_intro, apply_user, train_target, sort, remark, create_time, creator_id, creator_name, last_update_time, updator_id, updator_name, is_delete from hz_course where resource_id = #{resourceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select resource_id, logo_url, course_name, course_sn, course_type, score, course_intro, apply_user, train_target, sort, remark, create_time, creator_id, creator_name, last_update_time, updator_id, updator_name, is_delete from hz_course
